item.title: CVE-2012-6639|2024-08-06T21:36:01.960Z -- cloud-init -- cloud-init
item.description: An privilege elevation vulnerability exists in Cloud-init before 0.7.0 when requests to an untrusted system are submitted for EC2 instance data.
